title: Entire Country Being Developed Equally – Prime Minister
content: Prime Minister Mahinda Rajapaksa said there has never been an era in which the entire country is being developed equally, rather than just one province.He was speaking at the Kirama - Katuwana Joint Water Supply Scheme and Kirama Bus Stand opening ceremonies.The Kirama-Katuwana Water Supply Scheme was built by the National Water Supply and Drainage Board with funds from the Governments of Austria and Sri Lanka as part of a programme to provide clean drinking water. This project will supply purified drinking water to 34 Grama Niladhari Divisions.Steps have been taken to obtain clean water from the Kirama Reservoir in Warapitiya and to build a new water treatment plant at Welandagoda, to provide clean drinking water to the area’s 26,000 residents.
